import { useState } from 'react'; import { useAPI } from '../../store/APIContext'; import Card from '../../UI/card/Card'; import '../transaction/Transaction.css'; import './TransactionList.css' const TransactionList = () => { const { transactions } = useAPI(); const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const tstLimit = 8; const totalPages = Math.ceil(transactions.length / tstLimit); const pageResults = transactions.slice((page !== totalPages ? (page - 1) : (totalPages - 1))*tstLimit, tstLimit * page); return (
latest transactions
{pageResults && pageResults.map(i => )}
ID
User
Hotel
Room
Date
Price
Payment Method
Status
{i._id} {i.user.username} {i.hotel.name} {i.room.map(r => r.roomNumber).join(',')} {i.dateStart} - {i.dateEnd} ${i.price} {i.payment}
{i.status}
{1+(page-1)*tstLimit} - {page === totalPages ? transactions.length : tstLimit+(page-1)*tstLimit} of {transactions.length}
)} export default TransactionList;
